titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 321) proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide for a balanced budget for the United States Government and for greater accountability in the enactment of tax legislation.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee Filed by Stenholm. Discharge Petition No: 02.

bill.summary: 9/17/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 321 (balanced budget amendment).
